root_cause: Agent sandbox blocks oggm/salem imports during development AND agents used wrong import path (oggm.core.flowline instead of oggm.sandbox.distribute_2d)
fix_description: instruction_override tells agent to include proper import statements with CORRECT path (oggm.sandbox.distribute_2d); this triggers pipreqs detection and automatic addition of salem, tables, geopandas
notes: The distribute_2d module is in oggm.sandbox namespace, not oggm.core.flowline. This is publicly documented but agents cannot discover it without testing imports.
